commit_message:
feat: complete Sub-task 1E embedded family support with critical test fixes

- Implement embedded family support in get_prior.mvgam_formula()
- Add has_embedded_families() detection for bf() formulas with embedded families
- Make family parameter validation conditional based on formula type
- Fix trend constructor evaluation by removing forbidden tryCatch
- Use proper namespace (asNamespace("mvgam")) for trend constructor access
- Fix ZMVN stanvar S3 class test expectation (list vs stanvar)
- Fix PW logistic growth tests by adding cap parameter and data column
- Remove invalid cor parameter from VAR constructor tests
- Update task documentation with completion status and next steps

Related to Sub-task 1E in TRD-stancode-generation-update
